full_text:
1st 3 games into the season and I’ve been able to watch my #Mets not once, despite a subscription to @MLBTV. 

I gotta be truthful, considering video lockouts for local programming and reserved for Apple+ & ESPN; I’m just not finding much value in the service anymore.

I’m 53 yo and have been a @Mets fan since the 80’s but I have to admit; I might have to jump ship soon. This team is cursed. 

Don’t judge me, I HAVE MY HEALTH TO CONSIDER!! #LGM   https://t.co/4peQG7c6Oe

It seems Hope has never been able to recover after what Kylo did to Han. 

https://t.co/gr6jIjWjae
